description: Add play command URL parsing tests
context:
Test apps/controller/src/commands/play.ts URL parsing:

- Test YouTube URL extraction from input
- Test play command with valid URL
- Test play command with playlist URL
- Test play command with invalid URL
- Test play command worker availability check
- Test play command gRPC call with URL
- Test play command reply formatting
- Test play command error messages

Acceptance: Play command URL parsing and validation tested.
